items.text: good length on off, draws him forward to defend
items.shortText: Samuels to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: good length outside off again. He comes forward to defend
items.shortText: Samuels to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: bursts through deep midwicket's hands for six rank long hop, he rocked back to pull it, and got hold of it too. But Brathwaite was patrolling the boundary there. He ran to his left and got hands to the ball but couldn't hold on, and it goes for maximum
items.shortText: Samuels to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

items.preText:
Bishoo coming into the attack

Aveir : "Umm Rukayia Karim, what about that 100 odd he made against Zimbabwe just a few weeks ago?"
items.text: tossed up well outside off but too full. Tamim goes down and paddles it fine to fine leg
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: spinning into him from outside off, he gets behind the ball and punches to mid-on
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: comes down the track and picks it up off his toes to flick to deep midwicket. There's a man there thoughwho collects
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: too short and he goes down to pull-sweep it past square leg
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: fuller ball, he goes deep in his crease to punch it to long-on
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: too full, drifting on the pads and nudged to midwicket, where the fielder dives and saves the single. That will be drinks
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.preText:
The ground staff were clearing up dew during the break, but it doesn't seem like a lot of dew has set in. that is the only good news for West Indies though.

Muzammil: "Tamim really is an inspiration for new generation in Bangladesh. In ODIs, he averages more than 30 against all test playing nations except two (South Africa, New Zealand). In fact, against Pakistan, he averages 47 and has two centuries. Really good work."
items.text: length ball on the stumps, moves across to tuck it to square leg
items.shortText: Samuels to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on a good length outside off, he drives to mid-off
items.shortText: Samuels to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: on a good length spinning across him from middle, stopped on the pitch a tad. He waits and pushes it to long on
items.shortText: Samuels to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: fuller ball, clipped to short midwicket
items.shortText: Samuels to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: tossed up on off, he comes forward to defend
items.shortText: Samuels to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: flatter but fuller and outside off, he stretches forward to defend again
items.shortText: Samuels to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Saif: "Bangladesh team management should never think to play Soumya at the lower of the order. The left-hander is more comfortable with a place at the top of the order. "
items.text: tossed up but very full outside off and he comes forward to steer it past point. And oh dear, he's over-stepped. free hit coming up.
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, (no ball) 1 run

items.text: moves across to slog sweep it from outside off, but doesn't connect well. Deep square leg collects the ball
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: good length, turning into the batsman from off. He stays back and punches into the leg side
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: long hop, not put away. Too short and he rocks back to give it a great thwack, but doesn't connect and only goes as far as short midwicket
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: fuller on the stumps, he comes forward to tickle it to square leg. A bit of hesitation but they don't take the single in the end
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: good length on the stumps, punched back to mid-on
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: fuller on the stumps, he stretches forward to defend
items.postText: End of my stint for now. Back to Hemant
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: length ball, goes back and forces it towards long-on
items.shortText: Samuels to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: fuller on middle and leg, glanced towards fine leg for one more
items.shortText: Samuels to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: length, around middle, turned towards square leg for a quick single, Soumya sends him back
items.shortText: Samuels to Tamim Iqbal, no run
